title: If I accidently went ahead of the Imam in movement, is my prayer valid
transcript: Sa'ad from Pakistan Ya Sa'ad Assalamu Alaikum Sheikh Assalamu Alaikum Wa Barakatuh Sheikh, if I am behind the Imam and and if I am behind the Imam and he I am not sure if I might have accidentally gone above him gone above him meaning what you're wrestling with him as in I might have surpassed him or gone in movements in front of him would my prayer be valid yes it is valid if you're not certain it is valid but be be more careful
